name: Jing Yuan 0002
content: Jing Yuan | University of North Texas Jing Yuan Computer Science and Engineering Assistant Professor Discovery Park F276 Jing.Yuan@unt.edu About Faculty Info | Research Profile | Website | Education PhD in Computer Science, University of Texas at Dallas MS in Computer Science, Nanjing University BS in Computer Science, Nanjing University Research My research interests lie in the intersection of optimization, social computing and machine learning. The broad goal of my research is to develop algorithmic and data-driven solutions to facilitate decision making under uncertainty for social impact, with a focus on applications in social welfare and equity. My research has been mainly published in machine learning and information management venues, including AAAI, AAMAS, IJCAI, and CIKM. Publications Please visit Faculty Info page and click "Publications" tab. ©
